titles.title: Elimination of COLA for Members of Congress
A bill to provide that the cost of living adjustment to increase the rate of pay for Members of Congress in calendar year 1994 shall not take effect.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1996)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/24/1993--Introduced. Eliminates the cost of living pay adjustment for Members of Congress for FY 1994.
